lead_paragraph: The first county in the United States to impose an outright ban on oil and gas development could see its controversial ordinance gutted, if not tossed all together, as a federal judge considers the measure's constitutionality.

headline.main: Judge Weighs Tossing First US County Drilling Ban
headline.print_headline: Judge Weighs Tossing First US County Drilling Ban

snippet: The first county in the United States to impose an outright ban on oil and gas development could see its controversial ordinance gutted, if not tossed all together, as a federal judge considers the measure's constitutionality....
